post.body: @ambersmart is the braintrust delivering treasured LG Leader T shirts to your door step! She was an amazing addtion to the IC in 08
and IC'er. Someone who attends the Internet Campus. We are "one" church...until it comes time for metrics :).
Great to get back to the IC office and see @brandonaldson and @tonysteward. I work with all stars! Ready to rock with Wk 1 Invasion tonight!
Need some help from OKC tweets: Give me your top 3-5 mexican restaurants in the greater OKC area please.Making sure I'm not missing any!
Chidren sleeping in.Going old school with 40 days of purpose. Should probably go really old school and read Oswald Chambers. Running errands
Rang in the new year with friends from TX, Kathy made a killer breakfast. The Day and the year hold endless possibilities, boy I'm excited!
Grab your lunch/snack and join us at live.lifechurch.tv for some awesome worship and teaching from Steven Furtick http://live.lifechurch.tv
d_rchrisbyers praying for safe travels for the Byers on no one with southern accents?
Resolution week! Wanting to get IC people thinking about things we want to start doing heading into the new year and things to stop doing
Catch some great worship and teaching at live.lifechurch.tv NOW! . http://live.lifechurch.tv
Christmas lunch with @duregger and niece, rich! Tired from playing with all my kids toys Resting and mentally preparing for Christmas dinner
All that time to buy those presents, carnage in 5 minutes flat. Lit first fire in fire place this year. Smoke alarms going off. Priceless!
Christmas Exp on the IC starts Now! You'll either wish you had or glad you did! Join us @ live.lifechurch.tv http://live.lifechurch.tv
Where else can you clean the kitchen and experience great Christmas worship and teaching Join us now at Live.lifechurch.tv for Christmas Exp
Catch some incredible Christmas worship and great teaching at live.lifechurch.tv NOW! http://live.lifechurch.tv
Short week means work fast! My wife wants to know when I can help finish Christmas shopping? Honey we must have a bad connection staticky!
Learning about prayer through @BrandonDonaldson's awesome message on prayer on live.lifechurch.tv
Eph.4:So grateful this season we are One Church being built up in love.Heading to Bricktown to meet up with old camp friends, like 80s old.
Tieing up some loose ends and heading to Coffees Slingers to talk community with an ICer coming through town. Should be fun!
Kathy has a game tonight. I have the kids. Papa John's $6.99 large pizzas are sounding really good about now. I'm such a good dad.
